name: joker-eso
description: Best enjoyed with Skooma, Joker offers a collection of various jokes, riddles, fun utilities & other amusing pop-culture references - all readily available ingame for your leisurely chatting pleasure!

scripts.build-new: cd dist && mkdir %npm_package_version% && cd ../../ && winrar a -r -afzip -x/Joker/dist -x/Joker/images -x/Joker/.git -x/Joker/.vscode ./Joker/dist/%npm_package_version%/Joker.zip
scripts.dev-copy: xcopy "../Joker" "../../../OneDrive/Documents/Elder Scrolls Online/live/Addons/Joker" /s /i /y /exclude:.deploy-exclude && echo 'Copied to live Addons folder.'
